 </div>
 
 ## INSTALLATION
 
 ```
# Clone this repository
$ git clone https://github.com/JeffM4r/ArtPicker-docker.git

# Go into the repository
$ cd ArtPicker-docker/

# setup .env file (needs Cloudinary account, and create a upload preset called "artPicker")
to run this app, its needed only your cloudinary credencials from dashboard (Cloud Name, API Key, API Secret)

# install Docker
 ```
 
 ## USAGE
 
 ```
 # Run the app
 $ docker-compose up --build
 
 # Access http://localhost:4000 after everything starts from your browser
 ```
